verses.t: For{G1063} yourselves{G846}, brethren{G80}, know{G1492} our{G2257} entrance in{G3588} unto{G4314} you{G5209}, that{G3754} it was{G1096} not{G3756} in vain{G2756}:

But{G235} even{G2532} after that we had suffered before{G4310}, and{G2532} were shamefully entreated{G5195}, as{G2531} ye know{G1492}, at{G1722} Philippi{G5375}, we were bold{G3955} in{G1722} our{G2257} God{G3588} to speak{G2980} unto{G4314} you{G5209} the gospel{G3588} of God{G3588} with{G1722} much{G4183} contention{G73}.
For{G1063} our{G2257} exhortation{G3874} was not{G3756} of{G1537} deceit{G4106}, nor{G3761} of{G1537} uncleanness{G167}, nor{G3777} in{G1722} guile{G1388}:

But{G235} as{G2531} we were allowed{G1381} of{G5259} God{G3588} to be put in trust with{G4100} the gospel{G3588}, even so{G3779} we speak{G2980}; not{G3756} as{G5613} pleasing{G700} men{G444}, but{G235} God{G3588}, which{G3588} trieth{G1381} our{G2257} hearts{G3588}.

For{G1063} neither{G3777} at any time{G4218} used we{G1096} flattering{G2850} words{G3056}, as{G2531} ye know{G1492}, nor{G3777} a cloke{G4392} of covetousness{G4124}; God{G2316} is witness{G3144}:Neither preposition EN could be tagged, as the KJV rendering does not permit linkage to a specific word that is not already tagged

Nor{G3777} of{G1537} men{G444} sought we{G2212} glory{G1391}, neither{G3777} of{G575} you{G5216}, nor{G3777} yet of{G575} others{G243}, when we might{G1410} have been{G1511} burden{G922}some{G1722}, as{G5613} the apostles{G652} of Christ{G5547}.An interesting challenge: see if you agree with the way I tagged EN BAREI (an awkward construction in KJV)

But{G235} we were{G1096} gentle{G2261} among{G1722} you{G5216}, even{G302} as{G5613} a nurse{G5162} cherisheth{G2282} her{G1438} children{G5043}:For EN MESW, which KJV renders "among", I had a choice of tagging either EN or MESW; I opted for EN -- which of course leaves MESW untagged.

So{G3779} being affectionately desirous{G2442} of you{G5216}, we were willing{G2106} to have imparted{G3330} unto you{G5213}, not{G3756} the gospel{G3588} of God{G3588} only{G3440}, but{G235} also{G2532} our own{G1438} souls{G5590}, because{G1360} ye were{G1096} dear{G27} unto us{G2254}.

For{G1063} ye remember{G3421}, brethren{G80}, our{G2257} labour{G3588} and{G2532} travail{G3588}: for{G1063} labouring{G2038} night{G3571} and{G2532} day{G2250}, because{G4314} we would{G1912} not{G3361} be chargeable unto{G1912} any{G5100} of you{G5216}, we preached{G2784} unto{G1519} you{G5209} the gospel{G3588} of God{G3588}.

Ye{G5210} are witnesses{G3144}, and{G2532} God{G3588} also, how{G5613} holily{G3743} and{G2532} justly{G1346} and{G2532} unblameably{G274} we behaved ourselves{G1096} among you{G5213} that{G3588} believe{G4100}:

As{G2509} ye know{G1492} how{G5613} we exhorted{G3870} and{G2532} comforted{G3888} and{G2532} charged{G3140} every{G1538} one{G1520} of you{G5216}, as{G5613} a father{G3962} doth his{G1438} children{G5043},There is no corresponding word in the KJV for hUMAS
That{G1519} ye{G5209} would walk{G4043} worthy{G516} of God{G3588}, who{G3588} hath called{G2564} you{G5209} unto{G1519} his{G1438} kingdom{G932} and{G2532} glory{G1391}.

For{G1223} this{G5124} cause{G1223} also{G2532} thank{G2168} we{G2249} God{G3588} without ceasing{G89}, because{G3754}, when ye received{G3880} the word{G3056} of God{G3588} which ye heard{G189} of{G3844} us{G2257}, ye received{G1209} it not{G3756} as the word{G3056} of men{G444}, but{G235} as{G2531} it is{G2076} in truth{G230}, the word{G3056} of God{G2316}, which{G3739} effectually worketh{G1754} also{G2532} in{G1722} you{G5213} that{G3588} believe{G4100}.

For{G1063} ye{G5210}, brethren{G80}, became{G1096} followers{G3402} of the churches{G3588} of God{G3588} which{G3588} in{G1722} Judaea{G3588} are{G5607} in{G1722} Christ{G5547} Jesus{G2424}: for{G3754} ye{G5210} also{G2532} have suffered{G3958} like things{G5024} of{G5259} your own{G2398} countrymen{G4853}, even{G2532} as{G2531} they{G846} have of{G5259} the Jews{G2453}:

Who{G3588} both{G2532} killed{G615} the Lord{G3588} Jesus{G2424}, and{G2532} their own{G2398} prophets{G4396}, and{G2532} have persecuted{G1559} us{G2248}; and{G2532} they please{G700} not{G3361} God{G2316}, and{G2532} are contrary{G1727} to all{G3956} men{G444}:The word "are" is not part of the Greek text, but the KJV evidently did not italicize it as being supplied for grammatical reasons

Forbidding{G2967} us{G2248} to speak{G2980} to the Gentiles{G3588} that{G2443} they might be saved{G4982}, to{G1519} fill up{G378} their{G846} sins{G3588} alway{G3842}: for{G1161} the wrath{G3588} is come{G5348} upon{G1909} them{G846} to{G1519} the uttermost{G5056}.

But{G1161} we{G2249}, brethren{G80}being taken{G642} from{G575} you{G5216} for{G4314} a short{G5610} time{G2540} in presence{G4383}, not{G3756} in heart{G2588}, endeavoured{G4704} the more abundantly{G4056} to see{G1492} your{G5216} face{G3588} with{G1722} great{G4183} desire{G1939}.
Wherefore{G1352} we would have{G2309} come{G2064} unto{G4314} you{G5209}, even{G3303} I{G1473} Paul{G3972}, once{G530} and{G2532} again{G1364}; but{G2532} Satan{G3588} hindered{G1465} us{G2248}.

For{G1063} what{G5101} is our{G2257} hope{G1680}, or{G2228} joy{G5479}, or{G2228} crown{G4735} of rejoicing{G2746}? Are not{G3780} even{G2532} ye{G5210} in the presence of{G1715} our{G2257} Lord{G3588} Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547} at{G1722} his{G846} coming{G3952}?
For{G1063} ye{G5210} are{G2075} our{G2257} glory{G3588} and{G2532} joy{G3588}.
